meanings.definition: A software program used to defragment a computer's hard drive.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a defragger to organize my computer files.
meanings.sent2: The IT technician recommended using a defragger to speed up my laptop.
meanings.sent3: The defragger worked its magic on my messy hard drive.
meanings.sent4: The defragger acted like a digital janitor, tidying up my computer's storage.
meanings.sent5: After running the defragger, my computer felt brand new.

meanings.definition: A tool that rearranges fragmented data on a disk for improved performance.
meanings.sent1: My uncle lent me his defragger to optimize my computer's speed.
meanings.sent2: Using a defragger regularly can prevent your computer from slowing down.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly asked the defragger to do a dance while fixing my files.
meanings.sent4: The defragger was like a puzzle master, putting all the pieces in the right place.
meanings.sent5: The defragger's work was like a symphony, harmonizing my computer's data.
